recipe.title: Celery Root and Carrot Soup
ingredients: Celery leaves and chopped Granny Smith apple (for serving)
instructions: Place celery root and carrots in a large pot; add 6 cups water. Bring to a simmer over medium heat; cook until tender, 30–35 minutes. Let cool slightly. Purée in a blender with yogurt, honey, coriander, and ginger until smooth; season with salt and pepper.
Serve soup topped with celery leaves and apple.
